```lisp
['(:action collect
  ; Collect an item and prepare it for use
  :parameters (?agent - agent ?item - object)
  :precondition (and (available ?agent) (not (collected ?item)))
  :effect (and (collected ?item) (prepared ?item))',

 '(:action place_sticks_in_formation
  :parameters (?s - stick)
  :precondition (bundled ?s)
  :effect (in_formation ?s))',

 '(:action build_shelter
  :parameters (?component - object)
  :precondition (available ?component)
  :effect (part_of_shelter ?component))',

 '(:action place
  :parameters (?entity - object ?location - place)
  :precondition (and (prepared ?entity) (not (placed ?entity ?location)))
  :effect (placed ?entity ?location))',

 '(:action build
  ; Universal build action
  :parameters (?npc - agent ?location - place ?structure - structure ?materials - set)
  :precondition (and
                  (available ?npc)
                  (has_materials ?npc ?materials)
                  (not (built ?structure))
                )
  :effect (built ?structure))',

 '(:action gather
  :parameters (?npc - agent ?resource - resource ?area - area)
  :precondition (and
    (available ?resource)
    (selected_area ?area)
    (not (has ?npc ?resource))
  )
  :effect (and
    (collected ?resource)
    (has ?npc ?resource)))',

 '(:action search
  ; Search and gather resources or information
  :parameters (?agent - agent ?target - object)
  :precondition (and (not (searched ?agent ?target)))
  :effect (searched ?agent ?target))',

 '(:action start
  :parameters (?npc - agent ?location - place ?structure - object ?resource - object ?task - task)
  :precondition (and 
    (available ?npc)
    (in ?npc ?location)
    (built ?structure ?location)
    (has ?npc ?resource)
    (not (started ?task ?location))
  )
  :effect (started ?task ?location))']
```
